channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Timelapse shows rapid spread of Palisades wildfire
item.description: A plume of smoke is seen billowing over Los Angeles in a video charting the wildfire's growth.

item.title: Trump ramps up threats to gain control of Greenland and Panama Canal
item.description: The president-elect said he would not rule out the use of military force to seize control of the Panama Canal and Greenland.

item.title: A looming 'demographic cliff': Fewer college students and ultimately fewer graduates

item.title: Thousands flee as wildfires burn out of control in and around Los Angeles and homes are destroyed
item.description: California firefighters are battling wind-whipped wildfires tearing across the Los Angeles area. The blazes have destroyed homes, clogged roadways as ...

item.title: Cartel threatens to kill famed singer: "Last time you will receive a warning"
item.description: Photos of a banner threatening the lives of Natanael Cano and several other artists circulated on social media over the weekend.

item.title: Italian journalist Cecilia Sala freed by Iran
item.description: Reports said Sala had been held in solitary confinement in Tehran's notorious Evin prison.

item.title: See photos of fire, smoke and flight as wildfires race across Southern California
US accuses Sudanese paramilitary of genocide and sanctions its leader
item.description: The paramilitary group is accused of the "systematic" murder of men and boys and brutal sexual violence.

item.title: Police say hiker lost 2 weeks in mountains found in "great condition"
item.description: A hiker who got lost in Australia's Snowy Mountains has shocked police by surviving on a couple muesli bars and foraged berries.
